name: Hareraiser: Prelude
overview: Part one of a 2 part competition puzzle of animated graphics and text, which contains the necessary information for you to complete the second half of your search for the Golden Jewelled Hare. You will need part two to complete your search. Possible to win Hareraiser competition with prize up to £30.000,- or the fabulous Golden Jewelled Hare (made of 18 carat pure gold and gem set pendats). You needed to register with the enclosed registration card. Trivia: None won the prize. Haresoft went into bankruptcy leaving the jewelled hare to be auctioned on Sotheby's in 1988, where it sold for £31,900.
